name: User Persona Template
description: Template for user persona used in UI/UX design.

fields.title: Persona Name
fields.description: e.g., Tech-Savvy Tina

fields.title: Gender
fields.description: Select Gender

fields.title: Location
fields.description: e.g., Urban, London

fields.title: Occupation
fields.description: e.g., Software Developer

fields.title: Education
fields.description: e.g., Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science

fields.title: Relationship Status
fields.description: Select Status

fields.title: Family
fields.description: e.g., None

fields.title: Primary Goal
fields.description: e.g., To quickly find and purchase the best tech gadgets.

fields.title: Secondary Goals
fields.description: e.g., To compare products easily, To get expert reviews, To have a seamless checkout process.

fields.title: Motivations
fields.description: e.g., Staying up-to-date with technology, Saving time, Finding good value for money.

fields.title: Needs
fields.description: e.g., Clear product information, User-friendly interface, Reliable customer support, Fast loading times.

fields.title: Frustrations
fields.description: e.g., Confusing navigation, Slow websites, Lack of product reviews, Hidden fees.

fields.title: Tech Savviness
fields.description: e.g., High, Comfortable with various devices and platforms.

fields.title: Preferred Devices
fields.description: e.g., Smartphone, Laptop

fields.title: Typical Usage
fields.description: e.g., Spends several hours online daily, mostly on social media, e-commerce, and tech blogs.

fields.title: Social Media
fields.description: e.g., Active on LinkedIn, Twitter, and Reddit.

fields.title: Online Shopping Habits
fields.description: e.g., Researches products thoroughly before purchasing, prefers online reviews, uses mobile apps for shopping.

fields.title: Personality
fields.description: e.g., Analytical, Efficient, Curious, Independent.

fields.title: Values
fields.description: e.g., Quality, Efficiency, Innovation, Transparency.

fields.title: Quote
fields.description: e.g., "I need information, and I need it fast."

fields.title: Scenario/User Story
fields.description: e.g., "Tina is looking to upgrade her laptop. She needs a powerful and portable device for her work. She starts by searching online, comparing different models, and reading reviews. She wants to find a reliable website with clear product specifications and a secure checkout process."

fields.title: Visual Style Preferences
fields.description: e.g., Modern, clean, minimalist, tech-focused.

fields.title: Notes
fields.description: e.g., Include any additional relevant information.
